question:
Consider the following statements about the No Confidence Motion:
  1. The motion can be introduced in Lok Sabha but not in Rajya Sabha
  2. It is moved against the entire Council of Ministers
  3. If the motion is passed, the council of ministers have to resign
  Which of the above statements are correct?
explanation:
All given statements are correct
No-confidence motion can be moved only in Lok Sabha and is not allowed in Rajya Sabha
It is moved against the entire Council of Ministers and not individual ministers or private members
It needs support of at least 50 members when introduced in Lok Sabha
If the motion is passed, the council of ministers have to resign
